errors.msg: Commit not allowed after pulse is set

docs: Minimum number of oracle attestations required (PR2 will consume this).

docs: NOTE: fixed max_len to keep account size deterministic.

fields.name: reward_fee_bps
docs: Fee charged on minted rewards (basis points). 100 = 1%.
